sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
    .card
        span.card__hash Nomination
        .card__title Best Learning App
        .card__content
            .card__avatar
                img(src="@/assets/uploads/card-picture.png")
            .card__description
                p.card__name {{name}}
                p.card__text {{text | ellipsisText}}
        router-link.card__link(to="/application") open more
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'NominationCard',
    data: function(){
        return {}
    },
    props: {
        name: {
            type: String,
            default: 'Gecata by Movavi'
        },
        text: {
            type: String,
            default: 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Maecenas eget purus augue.'
        }
    },
    filters: {
        ellipsisText: function(value) {
			if(value) {
				if(value.length > 90) {
					value = value.substr(0,90);
					return value + '...'
				} else {
					return value
				}
			}
		},
    }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
    .card {
        display: block;
        width: 383px;
        height: 307px;
        background: #FFFFFF;
        box-shadow: 0px 4px 33px rgba(52, 59, 76, 0.09);
        border-radius: 6px;
        padding: 25px 33px 34px 33px;
        position: relative;
        transition: .3s all ease;

        &:hover {
            box-shadow: 0px 4px 30px rgba(52, 59, 76, 0.13);
        }

        &__hash {
            font-family: 'Roboto-Regular';
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: normal;
            font-size: 12px;
            line-height: 23px;
            text-align: center;
            color: #37393E;
            opacity: 0.43;
            display: block;
            margin: 0 auto -12px auto;
            text-align: center;
        }

        &__title {
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Semibold';
            font-size: 23px;
            line-height: 48px;
            text-align: center;
            color: #37393E;
            margin: 0 auto 15px auto;
            letter-spacing: -0.5px;
        }

        &__content {
            border-top: 1px solid rgba(206, 219, 231, 0.26);
            padding-top: 24px;
            display: flex;
        }

        &__description {
            margin-top: -14px;
        }

        &__name {
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Semibold';
            font-size: 16px;
            line-height: 48px;
            color: #FF8284;
            letter-spacing: -0.5px;
            margin-bottom: -7px;
        }

        &__text {
            font-family: 'Roboto-Light';
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: 300;
            font-size: 12px;
            line-height: 20px;
            color: #35343E;
            opacity: 0.7;
        }

        &__avatar {
            margin-right: 20px;
            width: 72px;
            height: 72px;
            flex-shrink: 0;
            overflow: hidden;

            img {
                width: 100%;
                height: 100%;
            }
        }

        &__link {
            position: absolute;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            bottom: 34px;
            width: 139px;
            height: 40px;
            border: 1px solid rgba(52, 59, 76, 0.2);
            box-sizing: border-box;
            border-radius: 100px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Regular';
            font-size: 10px;
            line-height: 19px;
            text-align: center;
            letter-spacing: 1px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            color: #37393E;
            transition: .3s all ease;

            &:hover {
                border: 1px solid rgba(52, 59, 76, 0.5);
            }
        }

        &.application {
            .card__name {
                color: #357FDB;
            }
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 1200px) {
        .card {
            width: 304px;
            padding: 25px 33px;

            &__title {
                margin-bottom: 0;
            }

            &__link {
                bottom: 25px;
            }
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 960px) {
        .card {
            width: 100%;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 640px) {
        .card {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 25px 27px;

            &__title {
                margin-bottom: 15px;
            }

            &__link {
                bottom: 34px;
            }
        }
    }
</style>
